title: Saiyaara
description: In a world where humanity’s survival depends on courage, a group of explorers embarks on a thrilling journey across uncharted lands. Battling nature, enemies, and themselves, they must find a way to bring hope back home.
caption: An epic adventure of courage and discovery.

title: War 2
description: The world is on the brink of collapse as futuristic soldiers clash in a war that will decide the fate of humanity. With alliances shifting and secrets revealed, one warrior must rise to end the chaos.
caption: A futuristic war with humanity’s fate at stake.

title: Om Shanti Om
description: A timeless tale of love, destiny, and reincarnation. When a struggling actor’s life is tragically cut short, fate gives him another chance to rewrite his story and reunite with his true love.
caption: Love and destiny across lifetimes.

title: Yeh Jawaani Heh Deewani
description: A heartwarming journey of friendship, love, and self-discovery. Four friends explore the beauty of youth, chasing dreams while learning that life’s true adventure lies in the bonds we share.
caption: Friendship, love, and chasing dreams.

title: Dear Zindagi
description: A young woman struggling with heartbreak and insecurities finds guidance from an unconventional therapist. Together, they explore life’s challenges and the beauty of embracing imperfections.
caption: Finding happiness in life’s imperfections.

title: Aladdin
description: Step into a magical world where a street-smart young man discovers a mystical lamp that holds a powerful genie. With love, power, and destiny at play, Aladdin must choose between greed and goodness.
caption: A magical tale of love and destiny.

title: Param Sundari
description: A vibrant musical journey celebrating beauty, self-expression, and dance. Param Sundari is a dazzling showcase of rhythm, style, and the joy of performance.
caption: A song that celebrates beauty and spirit.

title: Kantara
description: Set in the coastal village of Karnataka, Kantara explores the clash between tradition, folklore, and modernity. When ancient deities awaken, the line between myth and reality blurs, leading to a powerful story of faith and survival.
caption: A divine tale of folklore and fate.

title: Doraemon
description: Doraemon, a robotic cat from the 22nd century, travels back in time to help a boy named Nobita overcome challenges. With futuristic gadgets, their adventures bring fun, laughter, and life lessons.
caption: A robot cat and a boy against life’s odds.

title: Shinchan
description: Shinnosuke Nohara, a mischievous 5-year-old, causes chaos everywhere he goes with his witty humor, hilarious antics, and innocent mischief that entertains kids and adults alike.
caption: The little prankster who makes everyone laugh.

title: Whispers in the Dark
description: A family moves into an old countryside mansion, only to discover it hides a dark secret. Mysterious whispers, eerie shadows, and unexplainable horrors soon reveal the house’s terrifying past.
caption: When silence speaks, terror begins.

title: Tourist Family
description: A quirky family sets out on a vacation abroad, only for things to go hilariously wrong. From language mix-ups to cultural shocks, their journey becomes an unforgettable rollercoaster of laughter.
caption: One trip, endless chaos.

title: Wednesday
description: At Nevermore Academy, Wednesday Addams discovers her psychic abilities while solving a murder mystery that involves her family’s dark past. Filled with gothic charm and supernatural twists.
caption: Dark, witty, and full of mystery.

title: Su From So
description: Two best friends set out on a hilarious journey filled with awkward moments, quirky characters, and unexpected twists. In their search for a new home, they realize the funniest adventures are the ones they never planned.
caption: A comedy of friendship and chaos.
